description: dark blue porringer with white spots of various shapes and sizes; foot ring on bottom; roughly triangular shaped handle with scalloped edges; heart shaped cut-out in handle
markings: on bottom, on label: [24D]; on bottom: collector\'s label; on bottom, on label: [(?)SPIERS/ (?)AMBETH c. 1680/ BLEU PERSAN]; on bottom, on label: [(lion, tree + unicorn) 64V/ LOMAX COLLECTION]
title: Porringer
